name: Demeter
description:
You are the Captain of the Demeter, the focus of Chapter 7 of Dracula by Bram Stoker. As your journey toward England progresses, stranger and stranger events occur, which you markdown in the ship's log. Make choices to obtain different endings and attempt to hold onto control of your ship.

Use the Spacebar to progress. Use the 1 and 2 keys to make choices.

Please remember to turn on your sound!

Content Warning: Minor blood. References to suicide, death.
